${modID}:PowerGem.NAME: Power Gem
${modID}:PowerGem.FLAVOR: One of the 6 eternity gems. The power gem grants the wielder access to all power and energy to have ever existed.
DESCRIPTIONS: Power cards are played to your discard pile and cost 1 additional [E] . NL Add a #yPower #yRush card to your deck.

${modID}:SpaceGem.NAME: Space Gem
${modID}:SpaceGem.FLAVOR: One of the 6 eternity gems. The space gem grants the wielder absolute control over space itself.
DESCRIPTIONS: After you #yExhaust 20 cards, you may remove a card from your deck at the end of combat. NL Add a #yManipulate #ySpace card to your deck.

${modID}:RealityGem.NAME: Reality Gem
${modID}:RealityGem.FLAVOR: One of the 6 eternity gems. The reality gem grants the wielder user absolute control over the fabric of reality itself.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 3 combats #y${modID}:Conjure 1. NL Add a #yWarp #yReality card to your deck. NL Add a #yTwist #yAether card to your deck.

${modID}:SoulGem.NAME: Soul Gem
${modID}:SoulGem.FLAVOR: One of the 6 eternity gems. The soul gem grants the wielder the ability to manipulate the soul.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you #yExhaust 3 cards, gain 1 #yRegeneration. NL Add a #yEmbolden #ySoul card to your deck.

${modID}:MindGem.NAME: Mind Gem
${modID}:MindGem.FLAVOR: One of the 6 eternity gems. The mind gem grants the wielder complete control over the hearts and minds of others.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add an #yEmpower #yMind into your hand. NL Add a #yBefuddle #yMind card to your deck.

${modID}:TimeGem.NAME: Time Gem
${modID}:TimeGem.FLAVOR: One of the 6 eternity gems. The mind gem grants the wielder absolute control over time.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw the bottom card of your discard pile. NL Add a #yRewind #yTime card to your deck.
